3D_DESCRIPTION: Converts your card into their 3D variant
INVALID_CARD_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_GIF_CONVERSION: {{author}} You cannot convert a `GIF` card into a `3D` variant
CARD_3D_ALREADY: {{author}} The card is already a `3D` variant
NO_EVENT_CARD_CONVERSION: {{author}} `Event` cards cannot be converted into `3D` variants
NO_3D_VERSION: {{author}} This character does currently not have a `3D` variant
3D_NOTE: You are about to convert this card into its "3D" variant. This process will permanently alter your card and cannot be reverted. The newly obtained card will have a "Gen" that is proportional to its old one. This process will also delete any applied "Frame"
EVENT_3D_NOTE: During an active "Event", all eligible cards will be converted into their "Event 3D" variant upon confirming this process
HALLOWEEN_3D_FAILED: {{author}} A Ghost has infested your card. The process has failed!
UPGRADED_3D: {{author}} Your card has been successfully converted into its `3D` variant
